profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on IT infrastructure, Linux systems, and automation within a cloud and infrastructure team. It lacks specific mentions of AI, machine learning, or generative models, which are central to ML Engineer and GenAI Engineer roles.

job_tasks.phrase: improving the current infrastructure landscape by automation
job_tasks.justification: Automation of infrastructure is a key component of MLOps, focusing on streamlining deployment and management processes.
Maintaining and ensuring the smooth running of systems and infrastructure is a core aspect of operations engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: building and expanding (new) systems and platforms
job_tasks.justification: This involves the development and creation of new systems and platforms, which falls under software development.
Improving or modifying existing systems and platforms is a software development activity.

job_tasks.phrase: infra delivery to our internal customers
job_tasks.justification: Delivering infrastructure services to internal users involves developing and managing the delivery mechanisms, akin to software delivery.

job_tasks.phrase: carrying out life cycle management of systems and software
job_tasks.justification: Managing the entire lifecycle of systems and software, from deployment to retirement, is a key responsibility in operations engineering.

soft_skills.phrase: You are responsible for your own development. That is why you decide how, what and when you learn.
At Odido we learn every day. All of us.
You carry projects from the start to a maintainable solution including knowledge sharing
collaborate well within team and with other colleagues
Your communication and coordination skills are developed well
You are able to work in an autonomous and structured way
You love to challenge people in a positive way
